## Issue Description

A clear and concise description of the issue.

## Steps to Reproduce

1. Create initial state
2. Apply diff
3. Revert diff
4. See issue

## Expected Behavior

What you expected to happen (e.g., state should be identical after apply/revert).

## Actual Behavior

What actually happened.
